scalf.cmsc335.finalProject

Interface TrafficView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    View

    public interface TrafficView
    Provides methods required by any GUI that can be used by the TrafficController. Abstracts away the implementation of the TrafficView.
    Author:
    Samuel Scalf
    Date:
    10 OCT 2020
    School:
    University of Maryland Global Campus
    Professor:
    Dr. Osama A. Morad, Ph.D.
    Course:
    CMSC 335 6380 Object-Oriented and Concurrent Programming (2208)
